title: Bug 109718: Tips show large content in text item in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGES DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USERS TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTER OUT UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips show in given format
Actual Result: Tips show in one line
OB: When a large content is put in the text item, the tips show the content in one line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the given format rather than in one line.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Put a large content in the text item.
3. Observe the tips shown for the text item to confirm that they are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
